work.name: Currency Solutions LTD
work.description:
Software developer:
Developing new services and separation old version of monolithic architecture product into Go microservices and AWS lambda functions. Technologies: PHP7, Golang, MySQL, AWS Lambdas, Gitlab (server supporting)

Development processes improvements: migration from old stack Stash (old BitBucket version)+ Bamboo to Gitlab + Gitlab CI/CD what improved continues delivery processes and decreased time to market.

work.name: Big Data Technology
work.description:
PHP/GO Developer in the feature team (team consisted: Project Manager, Designer, backend-developer, front-end developer, scriptwriter, designer, SMM manager):
involvement into developing a new product. Duties creation new product in Forex education area using technologies: PHP7, Symfony 3, Redis, Percona, Ansible, Go, RabbitMQ, service architecture and etc. Achievements: the first production realises after 3 months of development. Multilanguage resources with the integration of MetaTrader 4 server events. Improving team developing processes. Ability to creation feature independently from another component team adding code through products.

work.name: ITMO University
work.description: Engineer in R&D project: complex of design automation and prototyping of electronic means. Duties: patent review, development of the application forvisualization and auto creating G Code program from 3D formats like STEP, IGES, IDF for the CNC machine. Technologies: C++, OpenCascade, WinForms.

work.name: 220 volt
work.description: Developing web application http://www.mastercity.ru/ Technologies: PHP, Silex, Symfony3, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, MariaDB, MongoDB, Redis, Memcached, LiveStreet. http://www.220-volt.ru Creation of regression tests. Technologies: Java, TestNG, Selenium WebDriver, Docker, GitlabCI, Yandex Allure, xvfb, MySQL. Supporting and developing of Yudin service for push notifications. Technologies: Go, PostgreSQL, ReactJS, JS, BigQuery, RabbitMQ, Redis, Memcached, docker (for local development). Developing FIDO service for generation some marketing feeds (for yandex market, google merchant and etc.) Techologies: Go, PostgreSQL, Vue, Vuex, JS, JQuery, docker, redis.
